websocket.connecting: Đang kết nối với máy chủ
websocket.connection-lost: Kết nối với máy chủ đã mất. Đang kết nối lại...

tips.find-tracker: Không rõ tracker nào? Lắc tracker và trong menu sẽ sáng lên.
tips.do-not-move-heels: Hãy đảm bảo gót chân không cử động trong khi đo ghi!

serial-detection.new-device.p1: Vui lòng nhập thông tin Wi-Fi!
serial-detection.new-device.p2: Vui lòng chọn những gì làm với nó

assignment-section.title: Giao bộ phận
assignment-section.description: Thiết bị này được giao cho bộ phận nào.

body-assignment-menu.title: Bạn muốn giao tracker này cho bộ phận nào?
body-assignment-menu.description: Chọn vị trí bạn muốn giao tracker cho. Ngoài ra, bạn có thể quản lí tất cả tracker cùng một lúc thay vì từng cái một.

mounting-selection-menu.title: Bạn muốn giao tracker này ở đâu?

steamvr.title: SteamVR
steamvr.subtitle: SteamVR trackers
steamvr.description.p1: Hữu dụng nếu bạn muốn điều khiển cách SlimeVR hoạt động.

tracker-mechanics.title: Cơ khí tracker
tracker-mechanics.subtitle: Lọc rung
tracker-mechanics.description.p0: Chọn kiểu lọc rung cho tracker.
tracker-mechanics.description.p1: Dự đoán đoán cử động trong khi lọc rung cử động.

none.label: Không lọc
none.description: Để đo chiều chuyển y nguyên. Không sử dụlọclọc.

smoothing.label: Làm mượt
smoothing.description: Lọc cử động mượt nhưng tạo ít chậm rễ.

prediction.label: Dự đoán
prediction.description: Giảm chậm trê và để cử động gọn hơn, nhưng có thể tăng độ rung.

leg-tweak.title: Chỉnh chân
leg-tweak.description: Chỉnh chân có thể giảm hoặc loại bỏ chân đi xuyên sàn nhà nhưng có thể ảnh hưởng đầu gối. Sửa trượt sửa khi lướt, nhưng giảm độ chính xác ở một số cử động.

arm-fk.title: Tay FK
arm-fk.force-arms: Bắt tay từ kính thực tế ảo

skeleton-settings.title: Cài đặt cơ thể
skeleton-settings.description: Bật hoặc tắt hình cơ thể. Khuyên nên luôn để bật lựa chọn này.

gesture-control.title: Gesture Control
gesture-control.subtitle: Double Tap quick reset
gesture-control.description: Enable or disable double tap quick reset. When enabled double tapping anywhere on the highest torso tracker will activate a quick reset. Delay is the time between registering a tap and resetting.

dev-mode.title: Developer Mode
dev-mode.description: This mode can be useful if you need in-depth data or to interact with connected trackers on a more advanced level
dev-mode.label: Developer Mode

serial-detection.title: Serial device detection
serial-detection.description: This option will show a pop-up every time you plug a new serial device that could be a tracker. It helps improving the setup process of a tracker
serial-detection.label: Serial device detection

lang.title: Select language
lang.description: Change the default language you want to use

serial.title: Serial Console
serial.description.p0: This is a live information feed for serial communication.
serial.description.p1: May be useful if you need to know the firmware is acting up.

vrchat.description.p0: Change VRChat-specific settings to receive HMD data and send
vrchat.description.p1: trackers data for FBT (works on Quest standalone).

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: Toggle the sending and receiving of data
enable.label: Enable

network.title: Network ports
network.description: Set the ports for listening and sending data to VRChat

address.title: Network address
address.description: Choose which address to send out data to VRChat (check your wifi settings on your device)

trackers.title: Trackers
trackers.description: Toggle the sending and receiving of data

wifi-creds.title: Input WiFi credentials
wifi-creds.description.p0: The Trackers will use these credentials to connect wirelessly
wifi-creds.description.p1: please use the credentials that you are currently connected to

reset-tutorial.title: Reset tutorial
reset-tutorial.description: This feature isn't done, just press continue

enter-vr.title: Time to enter VR!
enter-vr.description: Put on all your trackers and then enter VR!

connect-tracker.title: Connect trackers
connect-tracker.description.p0: Now onto the fun part, connecting all the trackers!
connect-tracker.description.p1: Simply connect all that aren't connected yet, through a USB port.

assign-trackers.title: Assign trackers
assign-trackers.description: Let's choose which tracker goes where. Click on a location where you want to place a tracker

manual-mounting.title: Manual Mounting
manual-mounting.description: Click on every tracker and select which way they are mounted

automatic-mounting.title: Mounting Calibration
automatic-mounting.description: For SlimeVR trackers to work, we need to assign a mounting rotation to your trackers to align them with your physical tracker mounting.

step.0: 1. Squat in a "skiing" pose with your legs bent, your upper body tilted forwards, and your arms bent.
step.1: 2. Press the "Reset Mounting" button and wait for 3 seconds before the trackers' mounting rotations will reset.

step.0: 1. Stand upright with your arms to your sides.
step.1: 2. Press the "Reset" button and wait for 3 seconds before the trackers will reset.

put-trackers-on.title: Put on your trackers
put-trackers-on.description: To calibrate mounting rotations, we're gonna use the trackers you just assigned. Put on all your trackers, you can see which are which in the figure to the right.
put-trackers-on.next: I have all my trackers on

automatic-proportions.title: Measure your body
automatic-proportions.description: For SlimeVR trackers to work, we need to know the length of your bones. This short calibration will measure it for you.

put-trackers-on.title: Put on your trackers
put-trackers-on.description: To calibrate your proportions, we're gonna use the trackers you just assigned. Put on all your trackers, you can see which are which in the figure to the right.
put-trackers-on.next: I have all my trackers on

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Place a chair directly behind you inside your play space. Be prepared to sit down during the autobone setup.
preparation.next: I am in front of a chair

start-recording.title: Get ready to move
start-recording.description: We're now going to record some specific poses and moves. These will be prompted in the next screen. Be ready to start when the button is pressed!

steps.1: Sit on a chair then stand up.
steps.2: Twist upper body left, then bend right.
steps.3: Twist upper body right, then bend left.

verify-results.title: Verify results
verify-results.description: Check the results below, do they look correct?

done.title: Body measured and saved.
done.description: Your body proportions calibration is complete!
